data.title: Top 69 Startups in The Hague in 2024
data.meta_description: The Hague is home to hundreds of tech startups. In this article, you can find the best 69, along with their main information.
data.text:
1) Sketch

Sketch is the industry-standard digital design software, allowing designers to share and collaborate on their work.

Details of the startup:

Started in: 2010

Founders: Emanuel SÃ¡, Pieter Omvlee

Industries: Apps, Collaboration, Developer Platform, Web Apps, Web Design

Number of employees: 11-50

Funding: $20,000,000

Funding rounds: 1

Number of investors: 1 (Benchmark)

You can find their website here.

â
